item.title: Tributes pour in across India for revered BBC broadcaster Sir Mark Tully
item.description: Sir Mark Tully’s cremation was held on Monday in Delhi, where he lived even after leaving the BBC.

item.title: What India's Republic Day red carpet means for its foreign policy
item.description: Who sits beside India’s president on Republic Day signals Delhi’s diplomatic priorities to the world.
